metadata.title: CVE-2020-15982 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in cache in Google Chrome prior to86.0.4240.75 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitiveinformation from process memory via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
